sentences.sentence: Fossils show how the nostrils of ancestral whales moved from the tip of the snout to the top of the head.
sentences.translation: 化石展现了鲸鱼的鼻孔是如何一步步地从它们祖先长鼻子的末端跑到头顶上去的。

sentences.sentence: A vile smell assailed my nostrils.
The horse backed away, its nostrils flaring with fear.
sentences.translation: 马向后惊退，吓得鼻翼扇动。
